hint.text: Guddu has to pay for his own ticket also.

solution.text:
The total number of people = Guddu+His friends
\( \Rightarrow \) Therefore, number of people he is paying for = _{j}_ + 1 = _{{j+1}}_

content.text: Guddu wanted to watch a film with his friends. The cost of popcorn is 1/3 of the ticket price. Guddu treats _{j}_ of his friends to a movie and popcorn and spends a total of Rs._{{60*(j+1)}}_. Assuming everyone has one popcorn packet, how many people did Guddu pay for ?
